personalInfo.splInterest: Turkey, deer and duck hunting, bass fishing, Alabama athletics, time with family
personalInfo.clubAffl: Dalton G&CC (Dalton, Georgia), The Farm GC (Rocky Face, Georgia)

tourBios.carHigh:
Has played on the Peach State Pro Tour (now Hopkins Pro Tour), NGA Tour, eGolf Tour, Dakotas Tour and Emerald Coast Tour...Won six events on the Peach State tour.

2013: Played in one Web.com Tour event, missing the cut in the Mid-Atlantic Championship.

2009: Missed the cut in one Web.com Tour appearance, the Chattanooga Classic.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Member of 2004 state high school championship golf team, winning the individual title as a senior...Named to the SEC Academic Honor Roll from 2006-09. Was an Academic All-American in 2008...Played on 2008 SEC championship team.
tourBios.personal: Attended Dalton (Ga.) High School...Turned to golf after suffering too many football injuries...Favorite golf memory was shooting nine-hole 69 on his seventh birthday, playing with his dad, grandfather, uncle and cousin after receiving his first set of clubs...If not a professional golfer, would like to work for a large athletic brand in its marketing department...Favorite team is the Alabama Crimson Tide...Uses a 1965 quarter to mark his ball...Favorite app is Candy Crush...Favorite TV show is "The Big Bang Theory" and anything on the Outdoor Channel and Military Channel...Favorite movies are "Secretariat," "Saving Private Ryan" and "Gladiator."...Favorite entertainer is Luke Bryan, and favorite athlete is Peyton Manning...Headcover is "Big Al" (the University of Alabama mascot)...Would like to be Manning for a day "to play quarterback one game."...Favorite quote is from Joshua 1:9 in the Bible: "Be strong and courageous, for the Lord your God is with you wherever you go."...Along with wife sponsors a young boy in Uganda through an organization called Raise the Roof. The couple also supports the Fellowship of Christian Athletes and the College Golf Fellowship...Twitter name is @matthughes16.
